titleStmt.title: His Majesties last remonstrance to the whole kingdome of England in vindication of his royall integrity from the calumnious aspersions of some, who report that He doth only pretend peace, but not intend it, with his high court of parliament.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.
